medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The pain started after eating, subsided but did not resolve, and recurred throughout the day. No previous episodes of similar pain. He denied nausea, vomiting, diarrhea, melena, and change in urinary habits.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of lung cancer (RLL adenocarcinoma), bladder cancer, atrial fibrillation on coumadin, and stage III chronic kidney disease.
medical_history.family_history: Coronary artery disease in both parents.
